extension.summary: Launches Steam in Big Picture mode from within Kodi.
extension.description: Launches Steam in BPM from within Kodi - It will close or minimize Kodi, launch Steam in Big Picture mode and when Steam is exited Kodi will restart or maximize. Steam also comes with a full featured web browser than can be controlled with a game pad or remote and plays back flash content. It works with Windows, Linux, OSX and Android. Each OS has different settings available.
